snippet: Wells Fargo's chief financial officer, Tim Sloan, told a conference in Manhattan on Wednesday that the bank was weighing "selective acquisitions" as European banks put assets up for sale, Rick Rothacker of Reuters reports
abstract: Wells Fargo's chief financial officer, Tim Sloan, told a conference in Manhattan on Wednesday that the bank was weighing "selective acquisitions" as European banks put assets up for sale, Rick Rothacker of Reuters reports
